entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 11:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -40.8°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -45.0°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
